程序包 edu.monash.fit2099.engine

类 WeaponItem

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem
所有已实现的接口:

public abstract class WeaponItem
extends Item
implements Weapon
Class representing items that can be used as a weapon.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • WeaponItem

      public WeaponItem​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int damage, java.lang.String verb, int hitRate)
      Constructor.
      参数:
      name - name of the item
      displayChar - character to use for display when item is on the ground
      damage - amount of damage this weapon does
      verb - verb to use for this weapon, e.g. "hits", "zaps"
      hitRate - the probability/chance to hit the target.

  • 方法详细资料

    • damage

      public int damage()
      Accessor for damage done by this weapon.
      指定者:
      damage 在接口中 Weapon
      返回:
      the damage

    • verb

      public java.lang.String verb()
      Returns the verb used for attacking with this weapon, so that it can be displayed in the UI.
      指定者:
      verb 在接口中 Weapon
      返回:
      a third-person present tense verb, e.g. "hits", "zaps"

    • chanceToHit

      public int chanceToHit()
      Returns the chance to hit the target in integer. Use it altogether with nextInt() method.
      指定者:
      chanceToHit 在接口中 Weapon
      返回:
      Integer, such as
